pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: calligraphy (esp. Asian calligraphy based on Chinese characters)
highway (esp. one existing from the Edo period)

lessons.japanese: その国の首都は赤道下にある。
lessons.english: The capital of the state is right on the equator.

lessons.japanese: エクアドルのキトは赤道のすぐ南にある。
lessons.english: Quito, Ecuador, is a little south of the equator.

lessons.japanese: 赤道における経度1度当たりの長さ。
lessons.english: Distance per degree of longitude at equator.

lessons.japanese: 赤道は地球を二つの半球に分ける。
lessons.english: The equator divides the globe into two hemispheres.
